top.title: Anthropic Said to Be in Talks to Raise Funding at a $350 Billion Valuation

top.title: Grok, Elon Musk’s A.I., Is Generating Sexualized Images of Real People, Fueling Outrage
top.snippet: Late Thursday, Mr. Musk’s chatbot, Grok, limited requests for A.I.-generated images on X to paid subscribers of the social media site amid an outcry from victims and regulators.

top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Elon Musk's A.I. chatbot Grok faced backlash for generating sexualized images of real people, leading to restrictions on access to such content on social media.

top.title: Can A.I. Match Molière’s Wit? These Researchers Think So.
top.snippet: Scholars and artists at Sorbonne University trained artificial intelligence to imitate the French playwright’s themes, structures and sense of humor. The result is a new play.
top.rerankWhy: Explores AI's creative potential in literature
top.aiSummary: AI researchers at Sorbonne University have trained artificial intelligence to mimic the themes, structures, and humor of French playwright Molière, resulting in a new play.

top.title: Retail leaders at Target, Lowe’s and more on the AI investments they’re plotting for 2026

top.title: Brands are upset that ‘Buy For Me’ is featuring their products on Amazon without permission
top.snippet: Online merchants say Amazon’s “Buy for Me” AI tool listed their products without permission, forcing them to opt out after the fact and raising concerns about brand control, customer trust and the impact of AI on shopping.
top.rerankWhy: Concerns over brand control on Amazon are critical
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Brands are expressing frustration as Amazon's "Buy for Me" AI tool showcases their products without consent, prompting merchants to opt out post-listing and sparking worries about brand management, consumer confidence, and the influence of AI in shopping.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year. According to the British Retail Consortium, shop price inflation picked up to 0.7% year on year in December, against growth of 0.6% in November. This is in line with the 3-month average of 0.7%. […]
